Chief Inspector Jed Clamor , spokesman of the Southern Mindanao regional police , identified the slain businessman as Inderjit Singh , saying the victim was waylaid by robbers along a major road in Tagum City .
The victim was heading home after collecting money from borrowers in nearby Kapalong town on his motorcycle when he was fired at by two assailants waiting by the roadside , said Clamor .
